title: When Browsers Become the Attack Surface: Rethinking Security for Scattered Spider
description: As enterprises continue to shift their operations to the browser, security teams face a growing set of cyber challenges. In fact, over 80% of security incidents now originate from web applications accessed via Chrome, Edge, Firefox, and other browsers.
